es.uvigo.esei.amchartsJava.core.api.graphs

Interface IAmGraphStepController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAmGraphController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmGraphStepController

    public interface IAmGraphStepController
extends IAmGraphController
    Interface for AmGraphStepController.This interface contains methods used only by step charts. Details of AmGraph and its methods in AmCharts API.
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro

      • setPeriodSpan

        void setPeriodSpan(java.lang.Number periodSpan)
            throws OutOfRangeException
        Set periodSpan property.With improvedVisibility enabled, range activated.
        Parameters:
        periodSpan - Value for periodSpan.
        Throws:
        OutOfRangeException - Value out of range admitted: -2 to 2.
